title: Trade My PSA N28's for your SGC N28's
author: Orions father

posts.post_title: Trade My PSA N28's for your SGC N28's
posts.post_content:
Hello,
I have the following PSA cards that I have for trade for SGC cards. Scans are available on request. Looking to trade for equal grades, MAY accept a lower grade depending on the card. Let me know if you have any questions or concerns. Thanks.

Gaudaur PSA 4
